[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:00.83]Half of your face was stolen by the night
[00:03.73]The moon liked your eyes so much that she swallowed them whole
[00:07.45]The stars liked your skin the way it catches the light so much that they stole it to use as blinking
[00:14.07]I liked your body ? so much that I sung a soft lullaby to it between your steady breaths
[00:20.49]You're mine but the evening air is still jealous
[00:24.42]I kiss you like you're monumental because you are
[00:27.74]The night kisses you like you're monumental because she is upside your head
